A: 1. What is the name of the mother mentioned in the composition (a) Mrs Sandi Seriki (b) Mrs Mary Jones (c) Mrs Jane Doe
2. How old is the mother in the composition (a) 38 years old (b) 28 years old (c) 48 years old
3. The mother in the composition is described as short and _ (a) tall (b) fat (c) thin
4. What is the mother's complexion (a) white (b) brown (c) black
5. Her face is _ (a) square (b) round (c) oval
6. What color is her hair (a) brown (b) black (c) blonde
7. A hospital is a place where _ people are treated (a) healthy (b) sick (c) happy
8. Sick people in the hospital are called _ (a) doctors (b) nurses (c) patients
9. Who takes care of sick people in the hospital (a) teachers and students (b) doctors and nurses (c) police and firefighters
10. We use capital letters to begin people's _ (a) names (b) houses (c) cars
11. We also begin the days and _ with capital letters (a) weeks (b) months (c) years
12. Which word is a pronoun (a) table (b) she (c) run
13. Pronouns are words used instead of a _ (a) verb (b) adjective (c) noun
14. The present continuous tense is used for actions happening _ (a) yesterday (b) now (c) tomorrow
15. To form the present continuous tense, we add _ to the verb (a) -ed (b) -s (c) -ing
16. An abbreviation is the _ form of a word (a) long (b) short (c) full
17. What is the abbreviation for Doctor (a) Dr (b) Dctr (c) Doc
18. We use a full stop at the end of a _ (a) question (b) statement (c) command
19. A question mark is used at the end of a _ (a) statement (b) question (c) exclamation
20. An antonym is a word that has an _ meaning to another word (a) similar (b) opposite (c) same
B: 1. The short form of Mister is _________.
2. The short form of Professor is _________.
3. The short form of Reverend is _________.
4. The short form of Engineer is _________.
5. The short form of Mistress is _________.
C: 3. What is the present continuous tense used for?
answers_C: A hospital is a place where sick people are treated.
Pronouns are words used instead of a noun.
The present continuous tense is used for actions or events happening now.
An abbreviation is the short form of a word.
An antonym is a word that has an opposite meaning to another word.
